extendedInfo.description: Instant access to The House FM. Contemporary Christian music radio from Oklahoma City's KZTH also heard across Northern Oklahoma from Tulsa up to Wichita, Kansas on KJTH and online at TheHouseFM.com. CHR (Contemporary Hit) format with rock and pop artists like tobyMac, Third Day, Skillet, Sanctus Real, Jeremy Camp, Switchfoot, Stellar Kart, Relient K, Hawk Nelson, BarlowGirl, Kutless, David Crowder, Tenth Avenue North, Needtobreathe, Group 1 Crew, Grits, John Reuben, Newsboys, Disciple, Superchick, Jars of Clay, Red, Fireflight, and The Afters. Where Christian Hits Live - TheHouseFM. Contemporary Gospel music has never sounded better.Also features fun with McCoy in the Morning including contests and chances for listeners to call in with their opinions plus lots of laughs and great content for the life you're living. Wild HouseFM nighttime host Andy Youso brings you the All Request House Party Monday through Thursday nights with more music, chances to win and great on-air callers. Personalities throughout the day don't talk much... but when they do, it's relevant to what's going on in your life. And it will be encouraging to you and your family in a positive way. Also, there's great information like the Daily Money Makeover with Dave Ramsey. Weekend programs include The Weekend 22 Countdown and The House of Worship, a modern worship program.Application also features HD-2 signal Praise 88.7 (MyPraiseFM KLVV) with Light AC (Adult Contemporary) / Inspirational / Praise and Worship music on a second stream. Hear artists like Chris Tomlin, Steven Curtis Chapman, Michael W. Smith, Matthew West, Brandon Heath, Phillips, Craig and Dean, MercyMe, Casting Crowns, 33 Miles, Avalon, Mark Harris, Lincoln Brewster, Darlene Zschech, Hillsong, Big Daddy Weave, Natalie Grant, Twila Paris, and Point of Grace. Plus Biblical teaching programs on Praise88.7 include Focus on the Family with Dr. James Dobson, Family Life Today with Dennis Rainey, Insight for Living with Chuck Swindoll, InTouch with Bible teacher Dr. Charles Stanley, Turning Point with Dr. David Jeremiah, Money Life, a Christian Financial program and Breakpoint with Chuck Colson.After Thanksgiving, My Praise FM plays all Christmas music with limited interruptions. It's a great blend of holiday favorites featuring the classics from Bing Crosby, Burl Ives and more plus contemporary versions of great songs of the season all the way through Christmas day.Both streams are commercial free from this listener-supported ministry. When at your computer we hope you'll try our on-line streams from our web sites.The House FM Website - www.TheHouseFM.comPraise 88.7 Website - www.MyPraiseFM.com

reviews.title: Glitchy!
reviews.comment: I can\'t get the app to play a full song most days. It stops in the middle with an error message. I have to force close the app the get it to play again. I love The House FM. Just with the app worked well instead of stopping every minute or so.
